apiDrinks.name: Negroni
apiDrinks.steps: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

apiDrinks.name: French Negroni
apiDrinks.steps:
Add ice to a shaker and pour in all ingredients.
Using a bar spoon, stir 40 to 45 revolutions or until thoroughly chilled.
Strain into a martini glass or over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.

apiDrinks.name: Garibaldi Negroni
apiDrinks.steps: These are the steps for a Garibaldi Negroni.
